Package controllers.listeners.filter

Class GeneralFilterListener

java.lang.Object
controllers.listeners.filter.GeneralFilterListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExamDialogListener, FilterDialogListener
public class GeneralFilterListener extends Object
Implements updateFilter method used across several listeners
